content.rendered:
Want to learn more about ASC’s services and access all their resources? Check out the ASC Portal!

The Academic Success Center (ASC) is part of the Libraries and Learning Commons at ULV (located in Wilson Library), which is a vibrant, collaborative space on campus which supports the learning, teaching, scholarship, and wellness needs of students, staff, faculty, and alumni. The ASC is dedicated to providing all students with the tools and resources they need to be successful during their educational journey.

Using a model of peer to peer support, the ASC prioritizes students’ long-term development and trains our staff to connect students with their learning process and course content. The end result is a student deeply engaged with their peers, invested in their learning, and persistent with their educational pursuits.

ASC Services

ASC services include tutoring, academic coaching, classroom support, faculty/staff support, workshops for the campus community, the development of student resources, and placement testing services. Please navigate our site to find information about our services as well as our beliefs and commitment to equity, diversity, and inclusion.

Placement Testing

A placement test doesn’t just let the university know your strengths across multiple disciplines, it also allows students to place into – or out of – requirements for a major. ASC administers a number of placement tests that can save you time – and tuition – by leapfrogging you over material you already know and into classes that will foster a sense of lifelong learning. Placement Testing Schedule and Sign Up
